title: League of Legends for Linux/Ubuntu
body: Are there any plans to make League of Legends compatible with Ubuntu/Linux? League is LITERALLY the only thing keeping me on freaking windows. Please? Pretty please? {{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}

replies.body: While we don't *officially* support Linux/Ubuntu OS's, many players have been able to band together to find good ways of getting League running. I know there's a pretty big "League of Linux" subreddit helping out other players, but keep in mind this isn't officially supported so we at player support may not be able to fully help with those steps.
so is there any plans for the future for the development team to implement league for linux? literally using 10 GB of nothing just for windows OS on my hard drive just to play league.

Bro I feel your pain here I really do DX. I haven't personally seen any future plans for more Linux support, but that doesn't necessarily mean that nobody is thinking or talking about it. I know a lot of players on Reddit have banded to together to get League running smoother with Linus os's, but there's some risk in those steps if they aren't done correctly that our tech may not be able to fix so just be careful!
